# [Interview #1052: WOR Signing Table Q&A, Entry #57](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=1052#57)

#### Question

Any humorous character in the near future? I like the funny ones.

#### Brandon Sanderson

Um, if you haven't read
*Legion*
,
*Legion*
's pretty funny.
